title: SLFP 60th anniversary today: Accent on religious activities
content: Religious activities will take pride of place at the 60th anniversary celebrations of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party. The main ceremony to commemorate the party’s 60th anniversary will be held today at Temple Trees under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa. An Anniversary Week was declared to celebrate the SLFP’s 60th anniversary from August 30…
